p: Data analysis was conducted in R v3.3.3 [ 34] and Python v2.7. The R packages ‘sp’ v1.2–3 and ‘rgdal’ v1.2–5 were used to project the GPS data into the relevant coordinate reference system for Chad (EPSG:32634). The package ‘adehabitatHR’ v0.4.14 was used to calculate the dog’s total range (99% minimum convex polygons) and core range (60% kernel density estimate).
